member.name: IP_MCAST_COUNTER_INFO
member.summary: The IP_MCAST_COUNTER_INFO structure stores statistical information about Multicast traffic.

member.name: IP_MCAST_COUNTER_INFO.InMcastOctets
member.summary: The number of multicast octets received.

member.name: IP_MCAST_COUNTER_INFO.OutMcastOctets
member.summary: The number of multicast octets transmitted.

member.name: IP_MCAST_COUNTER_INFO.InMcastPkts
member.summary: The number of multicast packets received.

member.name: IP_MCAST_COUNTER_INFO.OutMcastPkts
member.summary: The number of multicast packets transmitted.
